item.title: 2-Hour Hilton Head Guided Kayak Nature Tour
item.description: Discover the natural beauty of Hilton Head Island with a guided kayaking tour. Meet your guide for a quick safety tutorial and then paddle out into the Broad Creek Wildlife Area. Keep an eye out for birds and dolphins as you explore salt marshes, tidal rivers, and creeks. Learn about the local ecosystem and history from your naturalist guide. No prior kayaking experience is necessary.

image.alt: 2-Hour Hilton Head Guided Kayak Nature Tour

item.title: Hilton Head Island Dolphin Boat Cruise
item.description: Learn about the marine life populating the waters off the coast of Hilton Head Island on this dolphin watching cruise. Up your chances of spotting dolphins and other marine animals with the help of your professional guide, who will also provide information about the ecosystem as you go.

image.alt: Hilton Head Island Dolphin Boat Cruise

item.title: Beaufort’s #1 Horse & Carriage History Tour
item.description: Explore the southern city of Beaufort aboard a horse and carriage during this small-group excursion. Enjoy a relaxing ride around the historic district while your guide regales you of stories from the Antebellum South. See Civil War sites, historic churches, and even movie sites as you tour the city.

image.alt: Beaufort’s #1 Horse & Carriage History Tour

item.title: Daufuskie Island Guided History Tour from Hilton Head
item.description: Remote Daufuskie Island is accessible only by boat and remains largely undeveloped, despite its fame as the setting of Pat Conroy’s novel “The Water is Wide.” A guided tour makes the trip a cinch—this package includes round-trip boat tickets, plus transportation between island attractions such as the First African Baptist Church and Mary Fields School, all visited with the benefit of commentary from your guide.

image.alt: Daufuskie Island Guided History Tour from Hilton Head

item.title: Hilton Head Pirate Ship Adventure Sail aboard the Black Dagger
item.description: Embark on a nautical adventure aboard the Black Dagger pirate ship, which transforms kids into little pirates for a treasure hunt on the waters of Hilton Head. The crew provides kids with pirate costumes and pirate lessons before setting sail in search of treasure. This family-friendly cruise has a choice of several departures in the morning and afternoon, making it easy to fit into your schedule.

image.alt: Hilton Head Pirate Ship Adventure Sail aboard the Black Dagger

item.title: History and Movie Tour of Beaufort by Golf Cart
item.description: Discover Beaufort’s historic district without the hassle of navigating a tour that highlights the town’s Hollywood past. In addition to telling little–known stories about the town’s 300–year history, your guide brings you to landmarks often missed by visitors, from unmarked Forrest Gump film locations to the cemetery used in The Great Santini.

image.alt: History and Movie Tour of Beaufort by Golf Cart

item.title: 90-Minute Private Dolphin Tour in Hilton Head Island
item.description: Hilton Head Island is known as one of North America’s best spots for watching dolphins in the wild. Get out on the water and take in amazing views of these intelligent, playful creatures during this private boat tour. With a Lowcountry Master Naturalist as your captain and guide, you’ll learn all about the ecology of Hilton Head while watching the dolphins along with other wildlife including rays, sharks, and sea turtles. Just your group (up to six passengers) cruising the waters, watching dolphins eating, playing, and socializing.

image.alt: 90-Minute Private Dolphin Tour in Hilton Head Island

item.title: America's Cup 12-Meter Yacht Afternoon Sail from Hilton Head
item.description: A sailboat cruise from Hilton Head is a peaceful way to see stunning Lowcountry landscapes without the noise of a moor. Join a captain and crew aboard a 39-foot long (12 meter) sailboat that competed in America’s Cup—head through quiet waters and past gorgeous scenery without the roar of a motor. You can even try your hand on deck and help out with the sails.

image.alt: America's Cup 12-Meter Yacht Afternoon Sail from Hilton Head

item.title: Beaufort City Minibus Tour
item.description: Over 24 Hollywood films have been shot in the historic town of Beaufort, South Carolina. Explore Beaufort without the hassle of navigating on a tour of the area’s highlights, from scenic film locations to historic homes. Your small group size ensures the full attention of your guide, who navigates for you and provides little–known stories about Beaufort’s past. Morning and afternoon departure times are available for your convenience.

image.alt: Beaufort City Minibus Tour

item.title: Hilton Head Island Guided Water Tour by Creek Cat Boat
item.description: Zoom around Hilton Head Island on a small, motorized "creek cat" boat during this guided tour. Get views of all the quintessential sights, as well as access to some smaller marshes and wildlife-rich areas. Enjoy the opportunity to operate your own creek cat under the supervision of a guide; multiple departure times available.

image.alt: Hilton Head Island Guided Water Tour by Creek Cat Boat

item.title: #1 Historical Horse Drawn Carriage Tour
item.description: Discover Beaufort’s old southern charm on a horse-drawn carriage tour around the historic center. Join a small group for a narrated tour of Old Beaufort and pass by the area’s key landmarks. Listen to your guide retell the history of the city from its early Colonial period to the American Revolution and Civil War eras up to the present day.

image.alt: #1 Historical Horse Drawn Carriage Tour

item.title: Parasailing Adventure at the Hilton Head Island
item.description: Soar over Hilton Head Island with a parasailing adventure. Get a bird’s eye view of Calibogue Sound, Harbour Town Lighthouse, and Daufuskie Island during the flight. Keep an eye out for local wildlife, including bottlenose dolphins. Take-off and land on the back of a custom parasail boat, or choose to cool off and get wet. Tandem and triple flights are also available for couples or small groups.

image.alt: Parasailing Adventure at the Hilton Head Island

item.title: Kazoo Factory Tour & Museum
item.description: Discover the story behind the kazoo, a popular music instrument, during this factory and museum tour. Visit Kazoobie Kazoos, a family-run manufacturer of kazoos in Beaufort, South Carolina to learn about these instruments. Explore the on-site factory and hear stories about this American-made and American-invented instrument. Bring the kids for an educational experience.

image.alt: Kazoo Factory Tour & Museum

item.title: Hilton Head Shrimp Trawling Boat Cruise
item.description: Take part in an authentic Lowcountry travel experience with this shrimping tour from Hilton Head Island. Join a crew on board a fishing boat and head out on the salt marshes for a chance to catch shrimp and fish, and learn about the environment and wildlife as you go. After the trip, hang out and enjoy a day pass to the Sea Pines Resort.

image.alt: Hilton Head Shrimp Trawling Boat Cruise

item.title: 2-Hour Private Hilton Head Dolphin Watching Cruise
item.description: Set out on a cruise from Hilton Head Island, South Carolina in search of Atlantic bottlenose dolphins. Board your private vessel and cruise past the Harbour Town Lighthouse and Daufuskie Island. While you sail, keep your eyes peeled for the playful dolphins as well as other local wildlife like bald eagles.

image.alt: 2-Hour Private Hilton Head Dolphin Watching Cruise

item.title: Walking Tour in Beaufort
item.description: Discover the charming southern city of Beaufort on a walking tour through the historic district. Join a small group and explore the antebellum streets while listening to your guide regale you with the city’s 500-year history. Learn about Native Americans, pirates, the Revolutionary War, the Civil War, and more as you visit monuments, churches, and statues.

image.alt: Walking Tour in Beaufort

item.title: 2-Hour Private Hilton Head Sunset Cruise
item.description: End your day in Hilton Head aboard a relaxing sunset cruise around the island and waterways. Board your private vessel and enjoy a calm ride on Calibogue Sound with views of Harbour Town and the area is awash in golden light. While you sail, keep your eyes peeled for several species of wildlife including the playful Atlantic bottlenose dolphin.

image.alt: 2-Hour Private Hilton Head Sunset Cruise

item.title: 90-Minute Dolphin and Nature Tour of Hilton Head
item.description: Cruising the salt-marsh ecosystem in search of dolphins is a popular activity in Hilton Head, but unlike other similar tours, this dolphin and nature tour uses small boats so wildlife isn’t scared away easily. Sail along the water from Shelter Cove Marina, down Broad Creek, and into Calibogue Sound, while keeping a lookout for Atlantic bottlenose dolphins, birds, and other animals that call the area home.

image.alt: 90-Minute Dolphin and Nature Tour of Hilton Head

item.title: Hilton Head Island Jet Ski Adventure
item.description: Hop on a Jet Ski and explore Hilton Head Island on this scenic tour. Leave from Palmetto Bay Marina, past gorgeous mansions, until you reach the designated area where you can zoom around as you like. Enjoy the beautiful surroundings and get the chance to observe birds, dolphins, and maybe even a sea turtle in their natural habitat.

image.alt: Hilton Head Island Jet Ski Adventure

item.title: 90 Minute Hilton Head Dolphin Tour
item.description: Discover the abundant waterways around Hilton Head Island on this wildlife tour that focuses on dolphins. Join a small group and board your vessel to cruise down Broad Creek and Calibogue Sound. See a few landmarks including the Harbor Town Lighthouse and Daufuskie Island, where dolphins are known to congregate.

image.alt: 90 Minute Hilton Head Dolphin Tour

item.title: 90 Minute Hilton Head Dolphin and Nature Cruise
item.description:
Join us for a tour on Broad Creek watching for dolphins and other wildlife in the salt marsh ecosystem. Explore Broad Creek, venture through the tidal marsh system, and learn about the island’s history. Along the way, your interpretive naturalist captain will entertain your group with fun facts and stories of the Lowcountry.
Our boats are stable, comfortable, and ideal for viewing wildlife.

image.alt: 90 Minute Hilton Head Dolphin and Nature Cruise

item.title: Hilton Head Dolphin Tour with Stop at Disappearing Island
item.description: Increase your odds of seeing dolphins in the wild on this dolphin watching cruise from Hilton Head. Sail out from easy-to-find Palmetto Bay Marina at your selected departure time: admire views of the shore, look for wildlife, and learn about the local ecosystem. Plus, take a quick stop to look for shells, starfish, and sand dollars at “Disappearing Island,” a strip of land only accessible at low tide.

image.alt: Hilton Head Dolphin Tour with Stop at Disappearing Island

item.title: 90 minute Hilton Head Sunset Dolphin Cruise
item.description:
Explore the salt marsh and take in views of the incredible Lowcountry sunset!
On this 90-minute tour, learn about the salt marsh and try to spot local dolphins! Guests are welcome to bring snacks and beverages on board. Don't forget to bring your camera for photos of the most incredible view of the lowcountry sunset. This tour is one-of-a-kind and memorable for all ages!

image.alt: 90 minute Hilton Head Sunset Dolphin Cruise

item.title: Hilton Head Guided Kayak Tour
item.description: Take a break from the beaches and entertainment of Hilton Head and get closer to nature on a guided kayak tours. In a small group of no more than 15, glide through the waters of Skull Creek, paddle through the rich ecosystem of the saltwater marshlands, and spot such wildlife as brown pelicans, egrets, herons, osprey, bald eagles, and Atlantic bottlenose dolphins.

image.alt: Hilton Head Guided Kayak Tour
